Description.Name: Bada BOOOM!
Description.Details: You rush through the corridor, alarms blaring throughout the ship, and arrive on the bridge just in time to see the Fire Crew extinguish the last flames on the Console, “What the hell happened?” Dr Murad’s barely concealed anger contorts her face into a snarl, “I told you there was something wrong with one of those components, but no, you were too frugal to replace them! Well guess what, you’ll have to replace all of them now!’ You stare back, mouth hanging open. It was a weird feeling being dressed down by one of your crew and the bitter pill you just swallowed was that she was right about it. You walk over to Farah, placing a hand on her shoulder, “Your right. As the commander of the Argo, it’s my duty to see to the safety of it and the crew. For what it’s worth, I’m sorry.” Farah straightens, “Thanks, but I shouldn’t have spoken to you like that. Forgive my outburst. It just pains me to see this happen when it could have been prevented.” You survey the damage, “so how bad is it?” She sighs, “All three components have been damaged as well as some other bits and pieces. It won’t affect our current destination arrival time, but until we replace these parts, the Console will be offline and we will not be able to use any Pirate Points." You survey the extensive damage done to the Console, "You have any ideas on cost and a timeframe?" Farah speaks with an astech before answering you, "The Tech estimates repairs to run around the ¢2,000,000 mark and could take up to 2 weeks to complete. What would you like to do Commander?"

Description.Name: Replace Parts
Description.Details:
You rub your temples for a moment, "Go ahead and proceed with the repairs.  No use worrying about what I should have done to prevent this."

Dr Murad nods and instructs her team of astechs to begin repairing the damage to the Console.

Description.Name: Postpone Repairs
Description.Details: The Repairs can wait for now

Description.Name: Postpone the Repairs
Description.Details: You collapse into your command chair, head in your hands, "Don't even think about saying 'I told you so'." You lean back in your chair and look at Dr Murad, who is trying hard choke back a retort. After a few moments of silence, you make your decision regarding the damaged Console, "Forego the repairs for now. I'm not ready to spend the time or resources on fixing that Console." Dr Murad bites her tongue and just nods. She turns and instructs her team of astechs to get the Console and surrounding area cleaned up and safe for the crew to move around.
